properties.name: simplewebserver.context-path
properties.description: The context path of the app i.e. <base-url>/<context-path>/**.

properties.name: simple-web-server.resource-path
properties.description: The path where the server looks for resources.

properties.name: simple-web-server.allowed-file-extensions
properties.description: A comma separated list of permitted file extensions served from the resource-path.

properties.name: simple-web-server.apps
properties.description: List of supported apps and their configuration values i.e. context-path, resource-path, and allowed file extensions.
